title: Video Game Genres Have Terrible Names, Let’s Fix That | Slightly Something Else
description:
This week on Slightly Something Else, Yahtzee and Marty discuss why some of your favorite game genres need new names.

title: Why Demon's Souls' Design Encourages You to Quit
description:
In todays episode JM8 dives into the designs that were forgotten on the cutting room floor of From Software's offices. How it punishes its struggling players with its over abundance of negative reinforcement loops.

If you want to see more game design content a new Anatomy episode will release every other week, or you can subscribe to JM8s personal channel for similar content: https://www.youtube.com/c/JM8GameDesign

title: Armored Core is the Perfect Next Step for From Software | The Takeaway
description:
A new Armored Core game has potentially leaked and Marty's here to tell you why this is a great next step for From Software to take after Elden Ring.
